original_text: he foresaw and spoke about the resurrection of the Christ, that he was not abandoned to Hades, nor did his flesh see corruption.
korean_text: 미리 본 고로 그리스도의 부활을 말하되 그가 음부에 버림이 되지 않고 그의 육신이 썩음을 당하지 아니하시리라 하더니

sentences.original_text: and spoke about the resurrection of the Christ
that he was not abandoned to Hades
nor did his flesh see corruption
